## Remarks

With configurable shadow, ripple effect, and FAB style. See [ButtonProps](./react-native-material-kit.buttonprops.md) for the available props.

Refer to [Guideline](https://material.io/design/components/buttons.html#) or [MDL implementation](https://getmdl.io/components/index.html#buttons-section)
